title: Weird Lag with Low Ping
body: Experiencing a weird kind of lag that ive never dealt with before. My ping didnt increase but it was as if my game was unresponsive and my character would just auto attack whatever was closest to him. for about 2-4 seconds i couldnt play my character but my ping didnt increase. Its been happening the past week and im confused, looking to recieve some feedback on what I can do to fix my internet or whether its on riots end.

replies.body: It sounds like you're experiencing packet loss which can appear as input delays, lag spikes, or unresponsiveness without impacting your ping.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the matches these are happening in so we can get an overview of your specific issue.  Let me know what you find out!

I ran the Log Reader and it said :

" NETWORK DIAGNOSTIC OVERALL RATING: NO ISSUES

Your average ping was 52 milliseconds, which means your ping was good overall.

The worst ping you experienced was 61ms. This indicates your connection was stable for this game.

You had minimal packet loss during this game, meaning you had a very stable connection."

And I'm sure I lagged hard atleast 5 times during this game

Assuming that log is from the impacted games where you're having the issue, it's really strange that the results are coming up in the clear.   Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can work with you individually to figure out what's happening.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to grab some logs for context and attach it to the ticket.  We'll get back to you!

Yeah I'm having the same issue. I have AT&T Fiber and have 300mbps upload and 120 download, My champion will move but it wont show the dmg being dealt and minions just stay frozen attacking even after they die. Then it'll all catch up at once. My ping doesn't go up at all and my FPS stays at 144

Everybody who has problems with packet loss, try this out : http://www.leatrix.com/leatrix-latency-fix . I also had packet loss problems but this program helped me. Maybe it can help you too. {{sticker:sg-shisa}}

> [{quoted}](name=icyqt,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OVc1PrXk,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-02-02T03:29:35.279+0000)
>
> Experiencing a weird kind of lag that ive never dealt with before. My ping didnt increase but it was as if my game was unresponsive and my character would just auto attack whatever was closest to him. for about 2-4 seconds i couldnt play my character but my ping didnt increase. Its been happening the past week and im confused, looking to recieve some feedback on what I can do to fix my internet or whether its on riots end.

I'm now experiencing this same exact type of lag with a ping of 20-40, it seems as if no animations will load in this time and the game will then play catch up and shoot all of the missed animations at once once its over with. This makes the game unplayable.

I have a problem similar to Corigg's. I will still be able to move and use abilities, but no animations will go on and new units won't load in, so if a champion comes into my view I won't see him until I catch up. My champion will appear to glide around and take damage from nothing. I have had lag problems before but nothing like this, so I don't believe it is an internet issue.  Has this been solved?
i have had the exact same problem for about a week and still cant find a fix

I had a similar problem today 150+fps and low steady/fixed ping at 30-35 but incredible lag and gameplay = to/worse than that of times when i have ping of 2000+ not just that it was every single person in game on both teams experienced this problem with no fps or ping problems we ducked in an out reconnected nothing all crap new game absolutely perfect no problems at all made no sense to me tbh i was bamboozled and a half

Hi there, luckily for me I was able to accidentally narrow down the issue it seems. Before the first game I noticed it in, the only out of the ordinary action I did was run "Logitech Gaming Software" for the first time on my computer. Needless to say the game was horrible. Initially tried re connecting and such. 

In my searches I came across this post by Riot

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues

which recommended I uninstall any 3rd party gaming software so I did that. 


I hope this helps. May your climbs be unlagged and your teams unsalty.
